meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Cover</kanji> your <kanji>face</kanji>. Not with your hands or a puppy, but with a <vocabulary>mask</vocabulary>! Okay, I guess you could cover it with a puppy mask, but that's all you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
